Uses of Class
tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group.Accordion

  • Packages that use Accordion 
    Package Description
    tech.lity.rea.skatolo  
    tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group  

    • Uses of Accordion in tech.lity.rea.skatolo

      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo that return Accordion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Accordion SkatoloBase.addAccordion(String theName) 
      Accordion SkatoloBase.addAccordion(String theName, int theX, int theY, int theWidth) 

    • Uses of Accordion in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group

      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group that return Accordion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Accordion Accordion.addItem(ControlGroup<?> theGroup)
      Adds items of type ControlGroup to the Accordion, only ControlGroups can be added.
      Accordion Accordion.close() 
      Accordion Accordion.close(int... theId) 
      Accordion Accordion.open() 
      Accordion Accordion.open(int... theId) 
      Accordion Accordion.remove(ControllerInterface<?> theGroup)
      Removes a ControlGroup from the accordion AND from skatolo remove(ControllerInterface theGroup) overwrites it's super method. if you want to remove a ControlGroup only from the accordion, use removeItem(ControlGroup).
      Accordion Accordion.removeItem(ControlGroup<?> theGroup)
      Removes a ControlGroup from the accordion and puts it back into the default tab of skatolo.
      Accordion Accordion.setCollapseMode(int theMode) 
      Accordion Accordion.setItemHeight(int theHeight) 
      Accordion Accordion.setMinItemHeight(int theHeight)
      Sets the minimum height of a collapsed item, default value is 100.
      Accordion Accordion.setWidth(int theWidth) 
      Accordion Accordion.updateItems()
      UpdateItems is called when changes such as remove, change of height is performed on an accordion. updateItems() is called automatically for such cases, but by calling updateItems manually an update will be forced.
